Summary: My sister and I saw lights that moved, so we thought we would check it out.
trends: There have been 38 other sightings in Roswell
There were no other sightings in Roswell on or around February 15th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsRoswell new mexico, just about to take a right turn on sunset from bonita,my sister and I were talking when she or I spotted yellow or amber lights-couldnt avoid seeing it-it was in front of us moving south,so we got all happy and said hell lets follow it,so we went straight and left around left on the curve until we got to Mcgaffey,we turned west looking for it,we found it now on our left on Mcgaffey passed the street were we first spotted it by the ball field,so as we drive on slowing down,cars did pass on the other side of the road heading east,well we both made comments about it going over the farm fields and a bunch of lights-so I thought I would count them, in all there were 14 not blinking,then I looked away for a second and my sister freaked,and said did you see that!she said there was a bright flash,I did see something but did'nt see where it came from,my sister said it came from what ever we saw,then we kept driving slow until it was out of site,then went home,did,nt tell but one of my friend's several month's later,got fed up with talking about ufo's cause I had seen a couple through the year's in Roswell since I had moved here in 1982,when you live in Roswell everyone and thier dog want's to know if I have ever seen a ufo (so very sorry this happend at night).
